name: Akuto: Showdown
description: Akuto: Showdown is an award-nominated, isometric, fast-paced action game where players compete with swords and guns in intense versus matches.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 Vista Processor: 1.6GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 10 Processor: 2GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB VRAM DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 600 MB available space
